Module contents¶

BrainNetworksInPython¶

BrainNetworksInPython is a Python package for the analysis of structural covariance brain networks. Website (including documentation):

http://whitakerlab.github.io
Source::
https://github.com/WhitakerLab/BrainNetworksInPython
Bug reports::
https://github.com/WhitakerLab/BrainNetworksInPython/issues

Simple example¶
